thread.title: Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai: Kartik and Aditya fight over Naira
thread.title_full: Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai: Kartik and Aditya fight over Naira

title: Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai: Kartik and Aditya fight over Naira
text:
Feedback 
Things are about to take an interesting turn on popular show Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai. In an upcoming episode of the show, the lead characters of the serial, Kartik and Naira, will celebrate the Mehendi function on the show. The two will be extremely happy, but things will take an ugly turn, thanks to Aditya, who will try to misbehave with Naira. Naira will obviously get upset about the issue, and seeing Naira upset, Kartik and Naksh will both teach Aditya a lesson. So, will Aditya take revenge? Only time will tell. Watch the video to know more. Next Video
